mapper.sql: f01_shop.id AS "id", f01_shop.type AS "type", f01_shop.main_project AS "mainProject", f01_shop.project_name AS "projectName", f01_shop.country_id AS "countryId", f01_shop.country_name AS "countryName", f01_shop.province_code AS "provinceCode", f01_shop.province AS "province", f01_shop.city_code AS "cityCode", f01_shop.city AS "city", f01_shop.area_code AS "areaCode", f01_shop.area AS "area", f01_shop.address AS "address", f01_shop.longitude AS "longitude", f01_shop.latitude AS "latitude", f01_shop.name AS "name", f01_shop.browse_volume AS "browseVolume", f01_shop.contacts AS "contacts", f01_shop.phone AS "phone", f01_shop.hide AS "hide", f01_shop.reason AS "reason", f01_shop.logo AS "logo", f01_shop.shop_desc AS "shopDesc", f01_shop.order_num AS "orderNum", f01_shop.examine_status AS "examineStatus", f01_shop.examine_time AS "examineTime", f01_shop.status AS "status", f01_shop.create_person AS "createPerson", f01_shop.create_time AS "createTime", f01_shop.update_person AS "updatePerson", f01_shop.update_time AS "updateTime", f01_shop.user_id AS "userId", f01_shop.collection_volume AS "collectionVolume", f01_shop.alipay_url AS "alipayUrl", f01_shop.wechat_url AS "wechatUrl", f01_shop.delete_flag AS "deleteFlag"
mapper.select: select count(*) from f01_shop where to_days(create_time) = to_days(now());
-- SELECT count(*) FROM f01_shop WHERE YEARWEEK(create_time) = YEARWEEK(now()); select count(*) from f01_shop where date_format( create_time, '%y%m' ) = date_format( curdate( ) , '%y%m' )
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO f01_shop( type, main_project, project_name, reason, hide, country_id, country_name, province_code, province, city_code, city, area_code, area, address, longitude, latitude, name, browse_volume, contacts, phone, logo, shop_desc, order_num, examine_status, examine_time, status, user_id, create_person, create_time, update_person, update_time, collection_volume, alipay_url, wechat_url, delete_flag ) VALUES
( #{f01Shop.type}, #{f01Shop.mainProject}, #{f01Shop.projectName}, #{f01Shop.reason}, #{f01Shop.hide}, #{f01Shop.countryId}, #{f01Shop.countryName}, #{f01Shop.provinceCode}, #{f01Shop.province}, #{f01Shop.cityCode}, #{f01Shop.city}, #{f01Shop.areaCode}, #{f01Shop.area}, #{f01Shop.address}, #{f01Shop.longitude}, #{f01Shop.latitude}, #{f01Shop.name}, #{f01Shop.browseVolume}, #{f01Shop.contacts}, #{f01Shop.phone}, #{f01Shop.logo}, #{f01Shop.shopDesc}, #{f01Shop.orderNum}, #{f01Shop.examineStatus}, #{f01Shop.examineTime}, #{f01Shop.status}, #{f01Shop.userId}, #{f01Shop.createPerson}, #{f01Shop.createTime}, #{f01Shop.updatePerson}, #{f01Shop.updateTime}, #{f01Shop.collectionVolume}, #{f01Shop.alipayUrl}, #{f01Shop.wechatUrl}, #{f01Shop.deleteFlag} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE f01_shop
type = #{type}, main_project = #{mainProject}, reason = #{reason}, hide = #{hide}, project_name = #{projectName}, country_id = #{countryId}, country_name = #{countryName}, province_code = #{provinceCode}, province = #{province}, city_code = #{cityCode}, city = #{city}, area_code = #{areaCode}, area = #{area}, address = #{address}, longitude = #{longitude}, latitude = #{latitude}, name = #{name}, browse_volume = #{browseVolume}, contacts = #{contacts}, phone = #{phone}, logo = #{logo}, shop_desc = #{shopDesc}, order_num = #{orderNum}, examine_status = #{examineStatus}, examine_time = #{examineTime}, status = #{status}, user_id = #{userId}, create_person = #{createPerson}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_person = #{updatePerson}, update_time = #{updateTime}, collection_volume = #{collectionVolume}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag}, alipay_url = #{alipayUrl}, wechat_url = #{wechatUrl},
WHERE id in
#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT name,logo from f01_shop where id=#{id}
SELECT alipay_url,wechat_url FROM f01_shop where id=#{shopId} and delete_flag=#{deleteFlag}
